#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <string>
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;

#define rep(i,e) for(int i=0;i<e;i++)
#define reps(i,s,e) for(int i=s;i<e;i++)
#define vi vector<int>

void printGrid(int (*grid)[100], int n, int m){
	rep(i,n){
		rep(j,m){
			if(grid[i][j] == -1){
				for(int x=i-1;x<=i+1;x++){
					for(int y=j-1;y<=j+1;y++) {
						if(!(x==i && y==j)){
							if(x>=0 && x<n && y>=0 && y<m){
								grid[x][y]++;
							} 
						}
					}
				}
			}	
		}
	}
	rep(i,n){
		rep(j,m){
			if(grid[i][j]==-1) cout << "*";
			else cout << grid[i][j];
		}
		cout << endl;
	}
}

int main(){
	int n, m, field = 1;
	string tmp;
	while(cin >> n >> m){
		if(n+m == 0) break;
		int grid[100][100];
		rep(i,n){
			cin >> tmp;
			rep(j,m){
				grid[i][j] = ((tmp[j] == '*')?-1:0);
			}
		}
		printf("Field #%d:\n",(field++));
		printGrid(grid,n,m);
	}
	return 0;
}
